title: All that glitters
creator_credit: Filmline International, Kinsman Media Corporation and Richard Miner
brief_description: This film shows the origin, uses and economic value of gold, and the different ways in which gold and gold equities might be purchased, It traces the history of the lustruous precious metal, its romance and its economic importance.
creator_credit_for_label: Filmline International, Kinsman Media Corporation and Richard Miner
